price: (1) Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allāh - He will waste their deeds.[1492]
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: [1492]- i.e., cause them to be lost or make them worthless, earning no reward.
